user.title: Configure Thermostat Contact Sensors
user.description: Set up monitoring of contact sensors to automatically pause your thermostat when doors/windows are left open. All areas and their sensors will be automatically discovered.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this configuration
data_description.thermostat: Select the thermostat/climate entity to control
data_description.open_timeout: Minutes a sensor must be open before pausing thermostat
data_description.close_timeout: Minutes all sensors must be closed before resuming thermostat
data_description.notify_service: Enter a notify service (e.g., notify.mobile_app_phone) or leave empty to disable

error.no_sensors_selected: Please select at least one contact sensor

configure_area_sensors.title: Configure Area Sensors
configure_area_sensors.description: Select an area to configure which sensors to use. ✓ = enabled, ○ = disabled

area_config.title: Configure {area_name}
area_config.description: Select which sensors and vents to use for this area.

data_description.enabled: When disabled, this area will be ignored by the integration
data_description.binary_sensors: Binary sensors in this area (motion, occupancy, contact sensors)
data_description.vents: Cover entities (vents) in this area. Can include individual vents or vent groups.
data_description.area_vent_open_delay_seconds: Override the global vent open delay for this area. Leave empty to use global setting.

global_settings.title: Global Settings
global_settings.description: Configure occupancy detection, thermostat control, timeouts, and notifications. Notification messages support Jinja2 templates.

data_description.min_occupancy_minutes: A room must be continuously occupied for this many minutes before it is considered active for heating/cooling. This prevents short visits from affecting thermostat behavior.
data_description.grace_period_minutes: When an active room becomes unoccupied, it will remain active for this many minutes before deactivating. If the room becomes occupied again during this period, it stays active. Minimum: 2 minutes.
data_description.temperature_deadband: Temperature tolerance for satiation. A room is considered satiated when its temperature is within this amount of the target. This prevents rapid on/off cycling.
data_description.min_cycle_on_minutes: Minimum time the thermostat must stay ON before it can be turned off. Protects HVAC equipment from rapid cycling.
data_description.min_cycle_off_minutes: Minimum time the thermostat must stay OFF before it can be turned on. Protects HVAC equipment from rapid cycling.
data_description.unoccupied_heating_threshold: Degrees below heat target that triggers heating even in unoccupied rooms. Protects rooms from getting too cold when no one is there.
data_description.unoccupied_cooling_threshold: Degrees above cool target that triggers cooling even in unoccupied rooms. Protects rooms from getting too hot when no one is there.
data_description.min_vents_open: Minimum number of vents that must remain open to prevent HVAC back pressure. The system will keep this many vents open based on priority: active rooms, occupied rooms, then rooms furthest from target temperature.
data_description.vent_open_delay_seconds: Seconds after a room becomes occupied before its vents open. Prevents vents from opening during brief pass-throughs.
data_description.vent_debounce_seconds: Minimum time between vent state changes for the same vent. Prevents rapid open/close cycling.
data_description.open_timeout: Minutes a sensor must be open before pausing thermostat
data_description.close_timeout: Minutes all sensors must be closed before resuming thermostat
data_description.notify_service: Service to call for notifications (e.g., notify.mobile_app_phone). Leave empty to disable notifications.
data_description.notify_message_paused: Message when paused. Available variables: {{ trigger_sensor_name }}, {{ open_count }}, {{ open_timeout }}, {{ thermostat_name }}
data_description.notify_message_resumed: Message when resumed. Available variables: {{ trigger_sensor_name }}, {{ close_timeout }}, {{ previous_mode }}, {{ thermostat_name }}
data_description.notification_tag: Tag for persistent/replaceable notifications (allows updates to same notification)
